sentences.english: Intense artillery strikes and waves of aerial bombardment were reported across the Gaza Strip.
sentences.chinese: 深入的炮擊，和飛機轟炸的震顫，貫穿整個加沙地帶。

sentences.english: One day, Lou received an order to bombard a tanker.
sentences.chinese: 一天，路接到任務去炮擊一艘油船。

sentences.english: The FO can use this term to communicate to his platoon that a friendly artillery unit has begun firing.
sentences.chinese: 前沿觀察員可用此術語通知其步兵排友軍已開始炮擊。

sentences.english: After the shelling, it refused to condemn the North.
sentences.chinese: 在韓國遭到炮擊後，它也拒絕譴責朝鮮。

sentences.english: They said the shelling damaged government buildings and homes.
sentences.chinese: 他們說炮擊炸燬了政府大樓和住宅。

sentences.english: North Korea must first day the ship sank and taeyonpyong shelling incident.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮首先要對天安艦沉沒和延坪島炮擊事件負責。

sentences.english: The North and South briefly exchanged artillery fire last Friday across the border.
sentences.chinese: 北韓和韓國上星期五在邊界地區相互進行了短暫炮擊。

sentences.english: The people in these two countries heard intermittent gunshot day and night.
sentences.chinese: 兩國的人民白天黑夜都能聽到間歇的炮擊聲。

sentences.english: Mr Ocampo said others were victims of the shelling of funeral processions.
sentences.chinese: 奧坎波表示，其他人則是在參加葬禮的過程中被炮擊。

sentences.english: The government has denied shelling the area.
sentences.chinese: 但政府否認炮擊這一地區。

sentences.english: Recently the Korean Peninsula due to strained inter-Korean shelling.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮半島局勢近期因韓朝炮擊事件呈現緊張。

sentences.english: When they bombarded the cemetery and bombarded the Gaza central park which is the Gaza municipal park.
sentences.chinese: 當他們炮擊公墓和加沙市政的中心公園。

sentences.english: It was the last of the cannonade.
This week's artillery attack is likely to be the latest example of this strategy in action.
sentences.chinese: 本週炮擊事件或爲朝鮮故技重施的最新例證。

sentences.english: French warships have bombarded factories and a railway line along the Italian coast.
sentences.chinese: 法國戰艦炮擊了意大利海岸附近的工廠和鐵路。

sentences.english: Park is from a smaller nearby island that was also shelled.
sentences.chinese: 樸明財住在延坪島附近一個小島，這次也遭受了炮擊。
